main_definition: Spaces refers to the physical areas or gaps between objects, as well as metaphorical concepts related to availability or emptiness.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Physical gap or area between objects
meanings_and_examples.example: The spaces between the bookshelves in the library were too wide, creating a sense of openness.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Free time or availability to do something
meanings_and_examples.example: I have some free spaces this weekend that I can use for studying.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Emptiness, lack, or absence of content
meanings_and_examples.example: The empty spaces on the canvas were just as important as the painted areas in creating a balanced composition.
After moving out, there are many unused spaces and rooms in my new house that need cleaning.
The construction team noticed significant spaces between the bricks of the wall, compromising its stability.
